Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of environmental protection to post a map of green roofs online
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of environmental protection to post a map of green roofs online.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to education and outreach regarding solar and green roof requirements
Items.MatterName: Education and outreach regarding solar and green roof requirements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a warming centers program

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of environmental protection to report on its progress toward decreasing the presence of sewage and stormwater contaminants in the city waterways and various strategies to achieve those goals, and providing for the expiration and repeal of such requirement
Items.MatterName: Requiring DEP to report on its progress toward decreasing the presence of sewage and stormwater contaminants in the city waterways and various strategies to achieve those goals, and providing for the expiration and repeal of such requirement.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to studying the feasibility of implementing solar-ready measures for commercial buildings
Items.MatterName: Studying the feasibility of implementing solar-ready measures for commercial buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a pilot program to reduce emissions from city-owned motor vehicles
Items.MatterName: Pilot program to reduce emissions from city-owned motor vehicles.
